question: Are muslims allowed to celebrate Birthdays, mothers day and fathers day?
answer:
QUESTION

Are muslims allowed to celebrate Birthdays, mothers day and fathers day?

ANSWER


Share:

 

Answer

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

Muslims are not allowed to celebrate these occasions as this is the combination of numerous sins and are completely unlawful in the light of Shari῾a.

 

For more details, please refer to the following link: http://www.askimam.org/fatwa/fatwa.php?askid=65237e1939987bf0e312080c25ac1344 

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

 

Ml. Abdur Rahman Shareef,
Student Dārul Iftā
